issue.title: Sparse Scenary in proposed qualifier and VRC scenes

content.raw:
This issue is no longer relevent but Thomas and I (with the help of others) have put together a pull request with various changes to the VRC worlds (on Eric's suggestion):

Can this pull request be pulled in?
#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/187/new-vrc-textures
Will that take long?
